product_name: CliniqueActive Glow Moisture Surge Skincare Set
summary: SummaryClinique Active Glow Moisture Surge Skincare Set is a trio of Moisture Surge skincare essentials to leave you glowing. A $93 value.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesIncludes Clinique's powerful hydrator, serum, and multitasking lip balm.Moisture Surge Active Glow Serum with hyaluronic acid is formulated with powerful actives that help exfoliate, hydrate, and brighten to give skin an instant and continuous glow.Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator Gel Moisturizer with hyaluronic acid fights back against life's daily dehydrations. The lightweight gel-cream sinks into skin for deep, lasting hydration, for skin that feels more resilient and looks glowing.Moisture Surge Lip Hydro-Plump Treatment Lip Balm instantly moisturizes, smooths, and preps lips for makeup. Leaves lips soft and supple.Free of: parabens and phthalates.Dermatologist tested. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.IncludesFull Size Moisture Surge Active Glow Serum (1.0 oz)Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator (1.0 oz)Moisture Surge Lip Hydro-Plump Treatment (0.24 oz)Item 2641066How To UseUse Moisture Surge Active Glow Serum with hyaluronic acid morning and night on clean skin. Start with 3 drops, adding more if preferred. Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using and the week after.Use Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator moisturizer in the morning and night on clean skin.Apply Moisture Surge Lip Hydro-Plump Treatment Lip Balm anytime. Use for an instant boost of hydration and for makeup prep.IngredientsSee packaging for full listing.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
